hero.title: Suplayer Kopi Terpercaya Pilihan Anda
hero.subtitle: Kami mengekspor kopi premium, cengkeh, dan briket arang kelapa — dipercaya oleh pembeli global.

about.title: Tentang Kami
about.text: PT Lancar Barokah Manfaat adalah perusahaan ekspor Indonesia yang mengkhususkan diri pada komoditas pertanian berkualitas tinggi dan produk olahan. Dengan komitmen terhadap keunggulan, kami memastikan setiap pengiriman memenuhi standar internasional dan tiba tepat waktu.

cards.title: Kualitas Ketat
cards.desc: Setiap batch diperiksa dan memenuhi standar internasional.

cards.title: Sumber Tepercaya
cards.desc: Kemitraan langsung dengan petani & produsen lokal terbaik.

cards.title: Logistik Andal
cards.desc: Dokumentasi ekspor efisien dan pengiriman tepat waktu.

list.name: Biji Kopi (Arabika & Robusta)
list.desc: Dipetik dari perkebunan terbaik Indonesia, cocok untuk roastery & importers.

list.name: Cengkeh
list.desc: Aroma kuat dan kualitas prima untuk industri makanan & farmasi.

list.name: Briket Arang Kelapa
list.desc: Rendah abu, panas stabil — ideal untuk BBQ & shisha.

list.name: Produk Unggulan Lainnya
list.desc: Kami juga mengekspor komoditas pertanian dan produk olahan dari hasil pertanian.

list.title: Kualitas Terpercaya
list.desc: Kontrol kualitas yang ketat memastikan produk memenuhi standar global.

list.title: Pengiriman Andal
list.desc: Jaringan logistik yang kuat dengan jaminan pengiriman tepat waktu.

list.title: Jaringan Global
list.desc: Melayani pembeli di seluruh Asia, Timur Tengah, Eropa, dan seterusnya.

steps.title: Penyedia
steps.desc: Bekerja sama langsung dengan petani dan produsen yang sudah tersertifikasi.

steps.title: Kontrol Kualitas
steps.desc: Melakukan pengecekan, penyortiran, dan tes lab bila dibutuhkan.

steps.title: Pengemasan
steps.desc: Menggunakan kemasan food-grade sesuai permintaan dan spesifikasi pembeli.

steps.title: Ekspor
steps.desc: Menyiapkan semua dokumen penting (COO, faktur, daftar kemasan, sertifikat) lengkap dengan fitur pelacakan.

hero.title: Your Trusted Coffee Suplayer of Choice
hero.subtitle: We export premium coffee, cloves, and coconut charcoal briquettes — trusted by global buyers.

about.title: About Us
about.text: PT Lancar Barokah Manfaat is an Indonesian export company specializing in high-quality agricultural commodities and processed products. With a commitment to excellence, we ensure every shipment meets international standards and arrives on time.

cards.title: Strict Quality
cards.desc: Every batch inspected to meet international standards.

cards.title: Trusted Sourcing
cards.desc: Direct partnerships with top local farmers & producers.

cards.title: Reliable Logistics
cards.desc: Efficient export documentation and timely shipments.

list.name: Coffee Beans (Arabica & Robusta)
list.desc: Sourced from Indonesia’s finest estates; ideal for roasteries & importers.

list.name: Cloves
list.desc: Rich aroma and prime quality for food & pharma industries.

list.name: Coconut Charcoal Briquettes
list.desc: Low ash, steady heat — perfect for BBQ & shisha.

list.name: Specialty Products
list.desc: We also export agricultural commodities and processed products derived from agricultural produce.

list.title: Trusted Quality
list.desc: Strict quality control ensures products meet global standards.

list.title: Reliable Shipping
list.desc: Strong logistics network with on-time delivery guarantee.

list.title: Global Network
list.desc: Serving buyers across Asia, Middle East, Europe, and beyond.

steps.title: Sourcing
steps.desc: Working directly with certified farmers and producers.

steps.title: Quality Control
steps.desc: Conducting inspections, sorting, and lab tests when needed.

steps.title: Packaging
steps.desc: Using food-grade packaging tailored to buyer requests and specifications.

steps.title: Export
steps.desc: Preparing all essential documents (COO, invoice, packing list, certificates) along with tracking features.

list.name: Importer
list.quote: Coffee beans were excellent, secure packing and on time.

list.name: Distributor
list.quote: Briquettes burn long and clean. Customers are happy.

contact.text: Ready to do business? Reach out today.
